slots.name: icon:value
slots.description: Icons for the selected option or options. Slot one icon per Dropdown Option. \`<value>\` should be equal to the \`value\` of each Dropdown Option.

type.text: GlideCoreCheckbox | GlideCoreCheckboxGroup | GlideCoreDropdown | GlideCoreRadioGroup | GlideCoreInput | GlideCoreTextArea

slots.name: prefix-icon
slots.description: An icon before the input field

slots.name: suffix-icon
slots.description: An icon after the input field

members.name: passwordToggle
members.description: For 'password' type, whether to show a button to toggle the password's visibility

attributes.name: password-toggle
attributes.description: For 'password' type, whether to show a button to toggle the password's visibility

slots.name: control
slots.description: The element with which the label is associated

slots.name: target
slots.description: The element to which the popover will anchor. Can be any focusable element.

slots.name: target
slots.description: The element to which the popover will anchor. Can be any focusable element.

members.name: name
members.description: The corresponding GlideCoreTab should have a `panel` attribute with this name

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The corresponding GlideCoreTab should have a `panel` attribute with this name

slots.name: target
slots.description: The element to which the tooltip will anchor. Can be any element with an implicit or explicit ARIA role.

members.name: placement
members.description:
The placement of the tooltip relative to its target. Automatic placement will
take over if the tooltip is cut off by the viewport.

attributes.name: placement
attributes.description:
The placement of the tooltip relative to its target. Automatic placement will
take over if the tooltip is cut off by the viewport.
